originalText.text: Stopped in for the first time on my way home from work this week. I got a pleasant greeting from Steve immediately and got seated pretty quickly, once he finished with a customer. Steve introduced himself, asked my name, and thanked me for choosing him for a haircut. I got a great haircut at a good price and had a pleasant chat with Steve while in the chair. Can't say enough good things about my first experience with Steve. I'll definitely be returning!

text.text: Stopped in for the first time on my way home from work this week. I got a pleasant greeting from Steve immediately and got seated pretty quickly, once he finished with a customer. Steve introduced himself, asked my name, and thanked me for choosing him for a haircut. I got a great haircut at a good price and had a pleasant chat with Steve while in the chair. Can't say enough good things about my first experience with Steve. I'll definitely be returning!

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Steve’s business for 11 years. As a woman with short hair it took me a while to find a barber that is also good with scissors. Steve has over 30 years experience as a hairstylist!  He also takes appointments over the phone unlike many other barbers. I sincerely recommend Steve if you want a haircut done with care. Do not hesitate.

text.text: I’ve been going to Steve’s business for 11 years. As a woman with short hair it took me a while to find a barber that is also good with scissors. Do not hesitate.

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Steve for over a year. As a queer person who is not a man, it’s been hard to find an queer friendly barber who takes me seriously and cuts my hair the way that I want. I found that right away with Steve. He does an excellent skin fade. On top of that, I believe he is the most competitively priced barber shop in the area.

originalText.text: Steve is a class act. Gives excellent haircuts at a very reasonable price. Been going here since 2016 and I don’t even live in the neighborhood anymore l.

originalText.text: I have been going to Steve for about a year now and he’s the best barber I’ve had. He always gives me the perfect haircut and is extremely friendly. Definitely would recommend!
